subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ben Revere, a 24-year-old outfielder, is expected to fill the center-field hole left by the trade of the two-time All-Star Shane Victorino in July.
snippet: Ben Revere, a 24-year-old outfielder, is expected to fill the center-field hole left by the trade of the two-time All-Star Shane Victorino in July.
